description: This file contains styles for a classic snake game application, defining variables for colors, layout, and specific styles for game components.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the main container of the game, aligns contents vertically and centers them.

classes.name: game-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the game, used for displaying the game's title and score.

classes.name: score
classes.description: Styles for the score display within the game.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Styles for the main game board, using a grid layout.

classes.name: cell
classes.description: Styles for individual cells within the game board.

classes.name: snake
classes.description: Styles for the snake element within the game.

classes.name: food
classes.description: Styles for the food element within the game.

classes.name: controls
classes.description: Styles for the controls section of the game.

classes.name: btn
classes.description: Styles for buttons used throughout the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the logo of the application.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header section.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button.
